title: Eames Style Lounge Chair 670
body: Our Eames Style Lounge Chair 670 is 100% leather cushion. Supported by injected foam (not cheap cut to shape foam,) therefore ensuring super fit for the shell. The lounge chair has 360-degree swivel and a non-adjustable 15-degree recline. The plywood is 7-layer veneer in beautiful rich rosewood.
